title: Ga. newborn dies hours after mother killed in crash
title_page: Georgia newborn dies hours after mother killed in crash
text:
A baby delivered Friday morning after her mother was killed in a car crash died hours later, the Macon Telegraph reported.
Alita Foster, 22, who was four months pregnant, died after crashing into a tree, Bibb County Coroner Leon Jones said.
Foster was taken to a hospital, where she was pronounced dead, the newspaper reported. A 16-year-old passenger was treated for a fractured arm.
The child was delivered by emergency C-section, Jones said. However, she was pronounced dead about 1:30 p.m., Jones said.
Fosterâ€™s parents were with the child in the hospital after the accident, the newspaper reported.
Read more of the story here.
In other news:
